# NSLocalizedFailureErrorKey | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Foundation ](/documentation/foundation)

- [ NSLocalizedFailureErrorKey ](/documentation/Foundation/NSLocalizedFailureErrorKey)

-  NSLocalizedFailureErrorKey 

Global Variable# NSLocalizedFailureErrorKey

iOS 11.0+iPadOS 11.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.13+tvOS 11.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 4.0+

```
let NSLocalizedFailureErrorKey: String
```

## [See Also](/documentation/Foundation/NSLocalizedFailureErrorKey#see-also)

### [Constants](/documentation/Foundation/NSLocalizedFailureErrorKey#Constants)

[`let NSURLErrorKey: String`](/documentation/foundation/nsurlerrorkey)The corresponding value is an `NSURL` object.[`let NSFilePathErrorKey: String`](/documentation/foundation/nsfilepatherrorkey)Contains the file path of the error.[`let NSHelpAnchorErrorKey: String`](/documentation/foundation/nshelpanchorerrorkey)The corresponding value is an `NSString` containing the localized help corresponding to the help button. See [`helpAnchor`](/documentation/foundation/nserror/helpanchor) for more information.[`let NSLocalizedDescriptionKey: String`](/documentation/foundation/nslocalizeddescriptionkey)The corresponding value is a localized string representation of the error that, if present, will be returned by [`localizedDescription`](/documentation/foundation/nserror/localizeddescription).[`let NSLocalizedFailureReasonErrorKey: String`](/documentation/foundation/nslocalizedfailurereasonerrorkey)The corresponding value is a localized string representation containing the reason for the failure that, if present, will be returned by [`localizedFailureReason`](/documentation/foundation/nserror/localizedfailurereason).[`let NSLocalizedRecoveryOptionsErrorKey: String`](/documentation/foundation/nslocalizedrecoveryoptionserrorkey)The corresponding value is an array containing the localized titles of buttons appropriate for displaying in an alert panel.[`let NSLocalizedRecoverySuggestionErrorKey: String`](/documentation/foundation/nslocalizedrecoverysuggestionerrorkey)The corresponding value is a string containing the localized recovery suggestion for the error.[`let NSRecoveryAttempterErrorKey: String`](/documentation/foundation/nsrecoveryattemptererrorkey)The corresponding value is an object that conforms to the NSErrorRecoveryAttempting informal protocol.[`let NSStringEncodingErrorKey: String`](/documentation/foundation/nsstringencodingerrorkey)The corresponding value is an `NSNumber` object containing the `NSStringEncoding` value.[`let NSUnderlyingErrorKey: String`](/documentation/foundation/nsunderlyingerrorkey)The corresponding value is an error that was encountered in an underlying implementation and caused the error that the receiver represents to occur.[`let NSDebugDescriptionErrorKey: String`](/documentation/foundation/nsdebugdescriptionerrorkey)[`let NSMultipleUnderlyingErrorsKey: String`](/documentation/foundation/nsmultipleunderlyingerrorskey)
